A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I walked away disappointed and wondering why the script for this movie was ever approved. TLJ is a long movie\, not because it is filling in lore or explaining characters introduced in the last movie or even in this movie\, it's long because of fluff. There are a lot of irrelevant scenes and side stories that could have been cut completely without affecting the overall plot. RIP Carrie Fisher\, you deserved a better movie as your send off.
